item.title: ISABELLA BANK Corp 10-K
item.description: ISABELLA BANK Corp, which is in the State Commercial Banks [6022] industry, SEC 10-K filing on March 15, 2022 had 28106 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: loans - 306 instances 1 - 267 instances 2021 - 261 instances financial - 246 instances interest - 243 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
